argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_cnegex | |- ( _i e. CC -> E. x e. CC ( _i + x ) = 0 ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- E. x e. CC ( _i + x ) = 0 |
| 4 |  | #P_addcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ x e. CC ) -> ( _i + x ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_mpan | |- ( x e. CC -> ( _i + x ) e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( _i + x ) = 0 -> ( ( _i + x ) e. CC <-> 0 e. CC ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( _i + x ) = 0 -> 0 e. CC ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_rexlimiv | |- ( E. x e. CC ( _i + x ) = 0 -> 0 e. CC ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- 0 e. CC |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ 0cn .  (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
